20101222221104.000|20101222221106.000|TR0|justification, said the voters were also 
20101222221106.000|20101222221108.000|TR0|saying, November, wait a minute.  Put a 
20101222221108.000|20101222221111.000|TR0|brake on excess spending and too much 
20101222221111.000|20101222221113.000|TR0|government.  And we want you to slow 
20101222221113.000|20101222221115.000|TR0|things down and turn things back there.
20101222221115.000|20101222221118.000|TR0|

20101222221120.000|20101222221122.000|TR0|lot of that kind of energy coming out of 
20101222221122.000|20101222221125.000|TR0|the election expressing itself.

20101222222754.000|20101222222756.000|TR0|
20101222222756.000|20101222222759.000|TR0|OBAMA:  While today marks the end of a 
20101222222759.000|20101222222801.000|TR0|particular struggle that has lasted almost 
20101222222801.000|20101222222803.000|TR0|two decades, this is a moment more than 
20101222222803.000|20101222222806.000|TR0|two centuries in the making.  There will 
20101222222806.000|20101222222808.000|TR0|never be a full accounting of the heroism 
20101222222808.000|20101222222810.000|TR0|demonstrated by gay Americans in service 
20101222222810.000|20101222222813.000|TR0|to this country. Their service has been 
20101222222813.000|20101222222815.000|TR0|obscured in history.  It's been lost to 
20101222222815.000|20101222222818.000|TR0|prejudices that have waned in our own 
20101222222818.000|20101222222820.000|TR0|lifetimes.

20101222222827.000|20101222222829.000|TR0|just as hard, gave just as much to protect 
20101222222829.000|20101222222832.000|TR0|this nation and the ideals for which it 
20101222222832.000|20101222222834.000|TR0|stands.  There can be little doubt, there 
20101222222834.000|20101222222836.000|TR0|were gay soldiers who fought for American 
20101222222836.000|20101222222839.000|TR0|independence, who consecrated the ground 
20101222222839.000|20101222222841.000|TR0|at Gettysburg, who manned the trenches

20101222223317.000|20101222223319.000|TR0|
20101222223319.000|20101222223321.000|TR0|Over the past week, I got to see some 
20101222223321.000|20101222223324.000|TR0|things in North Korea that few Americans 
20101222223324.000|20101222223326.000|TR0|ever get a chance to see.  Stand by for
